description: Twitter emotions dataset is a dataset of tweets labeled with 1-11 relevant emotions. The emotions are generated using a BWS (Best-worst scaling) voting schema. The meaning of the labels are anger anticipation, disgust, fear, joy, love, optimism, pessimism, sadness, surprise, and trust. Furthermore, different. The features are obtained with BoW representation from the presence and absence of the different words across tweets.
name: twitter_emotions
